entry.title: Qa инженер
entry.text:
#вакансия  #qa #senior #remote #удаленно #fulltime #blockchain 

Срочно ищем Инженера по тестированию смарт контрактов 

Формат работы: #удаленка
Занятость: #полная
Опыт: 5+лет
Зарплатная вилка: $2000-$4000

TON Labs - независимая международная IT-компания, которая занимается  разработкой решений на основе блокчейн-платформы TON, с командой из более 50 разработчиков, инженеров и профессионалов со всего мира.  Проект реализуется с нуля.

In a blockchain environment, a single mistake could cost you all of your funds — or, even worse, your users' funds. Testing of smart contracts according to the specification is a task of paramount importance.

Responsibilities
    Lead the efforts around shipping quality product
    Work with smart contract specification authors to assess specification feasibility   
    Develop test scenarios according to smart contract specification
    Create, develop and manage a unified expandable test automation framework 
    Create automated tests for existing and new smart contracts
    Develop test plans and perform multiple types of testing including functional, system, end to end, load, performance, data integrity, smoke, regression, and ad hoc
    Submit comprehensive defects using our bug tracking system
    Regress and verify defects as needed, record test results, and provide metrics
    Lead and implement plans for improving testing and release processes

Job requirements:
    3+ years of experience in Software Engineering, Test, or Deployment
    Good understanding of an asynchronous messaging model
    Some experience with Python/Unix shell scripting
    Strong analytical skills to work with developers for troubleshooting and peer review
    Effective written and verbal communication skills

The following qualifications are a plus:
    Understanding of basic principles and concepts of the TON Blockchain is a strong advantage
    BS degree or equivalent work experience in Computer Science or related field
    Experience with testing of asynchronous systems is an advantage
    Experience with Scrum and other Agile methodologies

Название компании: Ton Labs
